name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Firmware Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications. Strong expertise in **C** and **C++**, with a solid understanding of **RTOS** and **Linux** environments. Proficient in utilizing tools and concepts such as **JTAG**, **UART**, and **ICE** to enhance firmware robustness. Experienced in implementing security measures such as **secure boot**, **anti-rollback**, and **cryptographic signatures**. Adept at conducting **ransomware simulation** and **anomaly detection** to ensure firmware integrity.

Skilled in other programming languages including **Python**, along with version control using **Git**. Proven ability to design solutions that align with industry standards. A strategic thinker with a track record in the healthcare and financial sectors, capable of delivering applications that leverage modern technologies.
